Please enter your Name, email & password \n to create your account.

Rococo style, or Late Baroque, Style in interior design, the decorative arts, painting, architecture, and sculpture that originated in Paris in the early 18th century. The word Rococo is derived from French rocaille, denoting the shell-covered rockwork used to decorate artificial grottoes. Reacting against the ponderous Baroque that had become the official style of Louis XIV’s reign, the Rococo was light, elegant, and elaborately ornamented. Several interior designers, painters, and engravers—among them Pierre Le Pautre, Juste-Aurèle Meissonier, Jean Berain, and Nicolas Pineau—developed a lighter and more intimate style of decoration for the new residences of nobles in Paris, and the style was disseminated throughout France by means of engravings. In these designers’ work, walls, ceilings, and moldings feature interlacings of curves and countercurves based on S and C shapes as well as on shell forms and other natural shapes. Chinese motifs were also employed (see chinoiserie).

Welcome to FurniFind. By downloading or using our app, you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding.


User Account
 To use certain features of the app, you may be required to create an account. You agree to provide accurate and current information during registration.
 You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.


Products and Orders
 All products are subject to availability. We reserve the right to limit the quantity of any items or discontinue products at any time.
 All prices listed on the app are in [Currency] and are subject to change without notice. Prices do not include applicable taxes, shipping, and handling charges unless stated otherwise.
 Your receipt of an order confirmation does not signify our acceptance of your order, nor does it constitute confirmation of our offer to sell. We reserve the right to cancel or limit orders at our discretion.


Payment Terms
 We accept various payment methods, including [Credit Card, PayPal, etc.]. All payments must be made at the time of order.
 Our refund and return policy is outlined in the Refund Policy section of the app. Please review it before making any purchase.


Shipping and Delivery
 Shipping costs will be calculated based on the delivery location and size of the items purchased.
 Delivery times are estimates and may vary due to unforeseen circumstances.


Use of the App
 You agree not to:
 1. Use the app for illegal activities.
 2. Post any content that is defamatory, offensive, or inappropriate.
 3. Attempt to hack, exploit, or reverse-engineer the app.
 We reserve the right to terminate your account and access to the app if you violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activity.


Limitation of Liability
 We will not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the app, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, and consequential damages.


Intellectual Property
 All content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of [FurnitureApp] or its content suppliers. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without permission.


Changes to Terms
 We reserve the right to update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective when posted on the app. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.


Governing Law
 These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes arising out of or related to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Your Jurisdiction].


Contact Us
 For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at [support@furnitureapp.com].

Privacy Policy


At FurniFind, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our app.


Information We Collect
 We may collect the following types of information:
 1. Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment details provided when you create an account or make a purchase.
 2. Usage Data: Information about how you interact with the app, such as pages visited, time spent on the app, and features used.
 3. Device Information: Details about the device you use, including IP address, browser type, and operating system.


How We Use Your Information
 The information we collect is used for the following purposes:
 1. To process transactions and deliver the products you order.
 2. To improve the functionality and performance of our app.
 3. To provide customer support and respond to inquiries.
 4. To send promotional emails, offers, and updates, which you can opt out of at any time.
 5. To comply with legal obligations or resolve disputes.


Sharing Your Information
 We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted third parties in the following situations:
 1. Service Providers: We may share data with third-party vendors who help us operate the app, process payments, or deliver products.
 2. Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information to comply with applicable laws, regulations, or legal proceedings.


Data Security
 We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal information. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.


Retention of Your Information
 We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.


Your Data Rights
 You have the right to:
 1. Access and update your personal information.
 2. Request the deletion of your data from our systems.
 3. Opt out of receiving promotional communications.
 4. Restrict the processing of your information in certain circumstances.
 If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at [support@furnitureapp.com].


Cookies
 Our app may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can adjust your device or browser settings to refuse cookies, but this may limit certain functionalities of the app.


Third-Party Links
 Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites.


Changes to This Privacy Policy
 We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of the app constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.


Governing Law
 This Privacy Policy is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes arising out of or related to this Privacy Policy will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Your Jurisdiction].


Contact Us
 If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at [support@FurniFind.com].
